channel.title: Half Life 3 Theories
channel.description:
I have a theory for half life 3 involving appertures portal technology.
I beleive the G-Man has always used the Portal Gun in order to be one step ahead of Gordon throughout the half-life series. If you play through the games throughly or perhaps with cheats you should notice the G-Mans continual reappearence throughout the games.
Adrian Shepherd is due to make his return, Adrian also being apart of G-Mans 'property'
Adrian Shepherd from Opposing Force infact had a basic version of the Portal Gun, only he could send enemies or himself into the Xen world with it or if already in the Xen world bonus Earth Locations were visitable if Ammo permitted.
I believe this is why G-Man was after him and helped him during early game.
I believe G-man wants or already has the apperture portal weapon and will use either Freeman, Shell or Adrian to get it for him, or to work for him with it.
It would be interesting to play as G-Man with nothing but the Portal Gun and perhaps a Time Lapse Devise. All of G-Mans secret scenes and Easteregg locations throughout the series could be made sense of, Every time the G-man helped or guided any of the Half Life Characters these events could be taken into account and perhaps played through on a time-lapse basis from the perspective of G-man, Perhaps all jumbled up and confusing but nevertheless the sense could still be made from it after repeated sessions, This could help solidify every episode of the series as G-man guides the events which eventually shape his future in bringin down the Combine and becoming the supreme commander of the Universe perhaps with Adrian Shepherd as an Inside man.
Anyway Besides the Point, I want to hear your thoughts. My opinion in one line is that G-Man has always used the Portal Gun to be one step ahead of Gordon, Adrian Shepherd, The Vortigons etc and i do expect to see the Portal Gun in half-life 3, only perhaps not for the characters we'd might expect.
For the Record, half life 3 is not confirmed but it is an inevitability due to the cliff hangers they leave us on. Nobody ever expected a half life 2 but it still came.
Thanks for Reading

I don’t care any more. I can’t find any theory like my theory and my theory seems to be logical since the clue’s are there. Online theories are stupid. Point me to a good believable one. I bet ya can’t. You haven’t yet, I’ve Googled.

I enabled super grav gun by the cheat, i play through the game again finding Gman one step ahead. Portal reveals a portal gun, How does Gman get around? A portal devise of course. Gman wanted Mesa destroyed, Adrian is in suspension until further notice. Gman speaks badly of Black Mesa, Aperture is in the same world. Portal 2 takes place decades later. Gman probably owns Aperture or is apart of it. Gman talks about how he keeps track of many people and its hard to keep track of an individual like Gordon all of the time. Giving the Vortigons a chance to step in. He did say he had some interesting requests for Gordon’s services. He says he has a fascination with those who can survive. I think Adrian Shepherd was more interesting to Gman than barney because Adrian Shepherd actually obtained the Portal weaponry manufactured at Black Mesa, i think not only his fighting skills, as barney was a survivor, but also his Portal Gun. He was literally one step behind Freeman when he first went to Xen and could be the perfect guy to hunt freeman down, Using advanced technology of course.
